about_the_game:
Retropy brings you relaxing and cozy 3-D object puzzling in an immersive VR or MR space.

Restore everyday objects in a puzzling world that brings together nostalgia and calming puzzling flow.

Retropy is inspired by the meditative state of puzzling, which allows us to complete a familiar object and also strengthen our cognitive function. Perfect for relaxing after a long day, you can play standing or seated for maximum comfort and enjoyment.

Key Features:
Unique retro objects and customization: Our puzzles are designed with retro qualities in mind, but we have a variety of diverse categories to explore in our virtual environments.

Competitive rewards: As you dive into Retropy, expect to encounter a wide range of puzzle types and difficulties. The game offers endless opportunities to challenge your mind and unlock new levels of creativity, including a competitive tier system that gives weekly rewards based on participation.

Endless possibilities: Perhaps the most exciting aspect is a free companion mobile app that will allow users to scan their own objects (in under 5 minutes) and puzzle them in our game. With a real world of objects at your fingertips, the possibilities of what you can collect and share is infinite! The only limit is your imagination.

name: Retropy VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD with 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: Meta Quest 2
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • VR Support: Meta Quest 3

short_description: A VR/MR puzzle game where you can bring everyday objects to life, including your own with our free mobile companion app! Puzzle interesting retro objects in intriguing soundscapes, and collect intriguing objects along the way as you become the ultimate puzzler.
